ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: How much have you/your child had the following problems during the past week? 1. Feeling sad/ I feel sad
How much have you/your child had the following problems during the past week? 2. Feeling bad about themself or not liking themselves/I feel bad about myself or don't like myself
How much have you/your child had the following problems during the past week? 3. Feeling down or depressed/ I feel down or depressed
How much have you/your child had the following problems during the past week? 4. Feeling nervous or afraid/ I feel nervous or afraid
How much have you/your child had the following problems during the past week? 5. Worrying about bad things happening/ I worry about bad things happening
How much have you/your child had the following problems during the past week? 6. Thinking sad or scary thoughts over and over again/ I think sad or scary thoughts over and over again
How much have you/your child had the following problems during the past week? 7. Talking back or arguing with parents or other adults/ I talk back or argue with parents or other adults
How much have you/your child had the following problems during the past week? 8. Refusing to do what adults tell them to do / I refuse to do what adults tell me to do
How much have you/your child had the following problems during the past week? 9. Doing things they are not supposed to doc/ I do things I'm not supposed to do
How much have you/your child had the following problems during the past week? 10. Being rude or disrespectful to people
How much have you/your child had the following problems during the past week? 11. Arguing with people / I argue with people
How much have you/your child had the following problems during the past week? 12. Breaking rules at home or at school / I break rules at school or at home
